title: How to Make a Round Steak Supper

steps.headline: Cut round steak into 4 serving size pieces.
Pound out round steak to help tenderize it.
steps.description: Use a meat mallet or a frying pan to pound out the meat.

steps.headline: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in an oven proof skillet or casserole dish.
Mix together mushroom soup and water in a measuring cup or small bowl.
Remove skillet or casserole dish from stove.
Spoon thinned mushroom soup over steaks.

text: Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Cut round steak into 4 serving size pieces.  Pound out round steak to help tenderize it. Use a meat mallet or a frying pan to pound out the meat. Heat 1 tablespoon oil in an oven proof skillet or casserole dish.  Brown meat on both sides.  Mix together mushroom soup and water in a measuring cup or small bowl.  Remove skillet or casserole dish from stove.  Spoon thinned mushroom soup over steaks.  Season with salt and pepper.  Cover.  Bake 1 1/2 hours until tender.  Serves 4.
